languages.text: {n}Ксенос моментально сбрасывает ленивое оцепенение, свивает хвост в кольца, готовясь прыгнуть, но... замирает. Его глаза неотрывно следят за стволом пистолета, направленного ему в морду. Довольно зашипев, змей изрекает:{/n} "Уважаю бесстрашных. Что тебе нужно?"

{n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос моментально сбрасывает ленивое оцепенение, свивает хвост в кольца, готовясь прыгнуть, но... замирает. Его глаза неотрывно следят за стволом пистолета, направленного ему в морду. Довольно зашипев, змей изрекает:{/n} "Уважаю бесстрашных. Что тебе нужно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself for a pounce, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at this face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

{n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself for a pounce, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at this face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

{n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at this face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

{n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at this face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

{n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at this face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

languages.text: {n}异形脸上闲适的表情瞬间消失。他盘起了尾巴，准备发起攻击。但随后……他停在了原地，眼睛紧紧地盯着瞄准他的枪管，之后发出了满意的嘶嘶声。{/n}“我尊重无所畏惧的人。你想怎么样？”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}异形脸上闲适的表情瞬间消失。他盘起了尾巴，准备发起攻击。但随后……他停在了原地，眼睛紧紧地盯着瞄准他的枪管，之后发出了满意的嘶嘶声。{/n}“我尊重无所畏惧的人。你想怎么样？”

languages.text: {n}La apatía del xenos se esfuma al momento y su cola se enrosca al prepararse para atacar, pero... se detiene. Mira fijamente el cañón de la pistola que apunta a su cara. Con un siseo satisfecho, proclama:{/n} «Respeto tu valor. ¿Qué quieres?».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La apatía del xenos se esfuma al momento y su cola se enrosca al prepararse para atacar, pero... se detiene. Mira fijamente el cañón de la pistola que apunta a su cara. Con un siseo satisfecho, proclama:{/n} «Respeto tu valor. ¿Qué quieres?».

languages.text: {n}異種族の無気力な態度は一瞬にして崩れ去り、尻尾を巻いて攻撃態勢に入ったが、突然、動きを止めた。彼の目は眼前に突きつけられたピストルの銃身を見つめている。彼は満足そうに喉を鳴らし、話しかけてきた。{/n}「度胸のある者は嫌いではない。何が望みだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の無気力な態度は一瞬にして崩れ去り、尻尾を巻いて攻撃態勢に入ったが、突然、動きを止めた。彼の目は眼前に突きつけられたピストルの銃身を見つめている。彼は満足そうに喉を鳴らし、話しかけてきた。{/n}「度胸のある者は嫌いではない。何が望みだ？」

languages.text: {n}Die träge Apathie des Xenos schwindet augenblicklich, sein Schwanz spannt sich an, und er setzt zum Angriff an, doch dann ... erstarrt er. Sein Blick ist starr auf den Lauf der Pistole gerichtet, die auf sein Gesicht zielt. Mit einem zufriedenen Zischen sagt er:{/n} "Ich respektiere die Furchtlosen. Was wollt Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die träge Apathie des Xenos schwindet augenblicklich, sein Schwanz spannt sich an, und er setzt zum Angriff an, doch dann ... erstarrt er. Sein Blick ist starr auf den Lauf der Pistole gerichtet, die auf sein Gesicht zielt. Mit einem zufriedenen Zischen sagt er:{/n} "Ich respektiere die Furchtlosen. Was wollt Ihr?"

languages.text: {n}Le xénos sort immédiatement de son apathie et enroule sa queue pour se préparer à attaquer, mais... il s'interrompt. Son regard est fixé sur le canon du pistolet braqué sur sa tête. Avec un sifflement satisfait, il dit :{/n} « Je respecte les intrépides. Que voulez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos sort immédiatement de son apathie et enroule sa queue pour se préparer à attaquer, mais... il s'interrompt. Son regard est fixé sur le canon du pistolet braqué sur sa tête. Avec un sifflement satisfait, il dit :{/n} « Je respecte les intrépides. Qu'est-ce que vous voulez ? »

languages.text: {n}Zenonun miskinliği bir anda geçiyor, saldırmak üzere kuyruğunu kıvırıyor. Sonra da... Duraksıyor. Gözleri, suratına bakan tabancanın namlusuna kilitlenmiş. Memnun bir tıslamayla sözlerine başlıyor.{/n} "Yüreklisin, yalan yok. Ne istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's idle apathy drops in an instant, his tail coils as he readies himself to strike, but... he freezes. His eyes are transfixed on the barrel of the pistol aimed at his face. With a satisfied hiss, he says,{/n} "I respect the fearless. What do you want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun miskinliği bir anda yok oluyor. Saldırmak üzere kuyruğunu kıvırıyor ama... duraksıyor. Gözleri, suratına bakan tabancanın namlusuna kilitlenmiş hâlde. Memnun bir tısıltıyla sözlerine başlıyor.{/n} "Yüreklisin, yalan yok. Nedir talebin?"
